commit.message:
[Ada] Repinfo: list the mechanism of functions only

2018-10-09  Eric Botcazou  <ebotcazou@adacore.com>

gcc/ada/

	* repinfo.adb: Remove with/use clause for Stand.
	(List_Mechanisms): List the mechanism of functions only.

From-SVN: r264965
